h2_title: How to Find Mother of Flamlings
h3_title: Mother of Flamlings Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Mother of Flamlings, thankfully, won't move. She'll stay where she is and use ranged fireball attacks, very similar to the Flamlings. To combat this, get as close to her as possible and try to land a few attacks. The downside of this, however, is that she will try to whip you with her body. If you can dodge these, she'll smack herself into the ground and be temporarily stunned.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Mother of Flamlings' and the sub-subsection 'Mother of Flamlings Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Mother of Flamlings, thankfully, won't move. She'll stay where she is and use ranged fireball attacks, very similar to the Flamlings. To combat this, get as close to her as possible and try to land a few attacks. The downside of this, however, is that she will try to whip you with her body. If you can dodge these, she'll smack herself into the ground and be temporarily stunned.
